hadiths.text: Ali said:"I was a man who had a lot of prostatic discharge, and the daughter of the Prophet (ﷺ) was married to me, so I felt shy to ask him (about that). I said to a man who was sitting beside me: 'Ask him,' so he asked him and he said: 'Perform Wudu' for that

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَنْقُضُ الْوُضُوءَ وَمَا لاَ يَنْقُضُ الْوُضُوءَ مِنَ الْمَذْىِ
chapter.eng-name: What Invalidates Wudu' And What Does Not Invalidate Wudu' Of Madhi (Prostatic Fluid)
